entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
